title: LOCCEF Safety Work Gloves MicroFoam Nitrile Coated-12 Pairs,Seamless Knit Nylon, Home Improvement,Micro-Foam Gloves (11/XXL, Grey-12 Pairs)
features: 𝐒𝐔𝐏𝐄𝐑𝐈𝐎𝐑 𝐆𝐑𝐈𝐏 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐗𝐂𝐄𝐋𝐋𝐄𝐍𝐓 𝐃𝐄𝐗𝐓𝐄𝐑𝐈𝐓𝐘: Work gloves with micro-foam nitrile coat resist light oils, offer great grip/abrasion resistance, and feature 3D snug fit.

𝐀𝐁𝐒𝐎𝐋𝐔𝐓𝐄𝐋𝐘 𝐁𝐑𝐄𝐀𝐓𝐇𝐀𝐁𝐈𝐋𝐈𝐓𝐘 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐂𝐎𝐌𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐓𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄: Ultrathin Design provide absolutely breathability and with water repellent performance.Seamless liner and spandex assure a maximum comfort and minimum hand fatigue.
𝐖𝐑𝐈𝐒𝐓 𝐃𝐄𝐓𝐀𝐈𝐋𝐒: Knit Wrist helps prevent dirt and debris from entering the glove.
𝐋𝐨𝐰-𝐋𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐞: Designed to produce minimal lint and dust.Recommend washing gloves in tempered water not exceeding 104oF or 40oC.
